Package GIS

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • GIS.Map
  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represent a map of a game board. The map has the dimensions of the frame. These dimensions are represented by an Range objects. each map have ranges of coordinates and ranges of image pixels.
    Author:
    Michael Lemberger, Liron Arad, Maoz Grossman.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Map​(int x, int y)
      This Map constructor get x and y numbers as arguments, this arguments are the dimensions of an image.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map​(int x,
           int y)
        This Map constructor get x and y numbers as arguments, this arguments are the dimensions of an image.
        Parameters:
        x - width in pixels.
        y - height in pixels

    • Method Detail

      • pixelToGps

        public double[] pixelToGps​(double xLon,
                           double yLat)
        This function converts two pixels to coordinates on the map.
        Parameters:
        xLon - x pixel.
        yLat - y pixel.
        Returns:
        array in size two of coordinates.

      • gpsToPixel

        public int[] gpsToPixel​(double xLon,
                        double yLat)
        This function converts two coordinates to pixels on the map.
        Parameters:
        xLon - longitude of a gps point.
        yLat - latitude of a gps point.
        Returns:
        array in size two of pixels.
